title: Flux 2.0 Pro - Latest Generation with Reference Images
excerpt: Meet Flux 2.0 Pro - the newest Flux model featuring support for up to 8 reference images and enhanced generation quality.
content:
What is Flux 2.0 Pro?

Flux 2.0 Pro represents the latest evolution of Black Forest Labs' acclaimed Flux model series. Released in 2025, it introduces groundbreaking reference image support, allowing you to guide AI generation with up to 8 example images.

Revolutionary Reference Image Support

What Are Reference Images?

Reference images are example images you provide to the AI to guide its output. Unlike image-to-image transformation, reference images influence the style, composition, or subject characteristics without directly modifying them.

Up to 8 References

Flux 2.0 Pro supports an industry-leading 8 reference images, enabling:

  • Complex style mixing from multiple sources
  • Consistent character creation across generations
  • Brand style guide adherence
  • Multi-reference composition guidance

How Reference Images Work

The model analyzes your reference images to understand:

  • Style: Color palettes, artistic techniques, visual mood
  • Composition: Layout preferences, framing styles
  • Subject matter: Character features, object types
  • Technical aspects: Lighting setups, camera angles

Key Improvements Over Flux 1.1

Enhanced Coherence

Flux 2.0 Pro produces more coherent images with:

  • Better anatomical accuracy
  • Improved object consistency
  • More logical scene compositions
  • Reduced artifacts in complex scenes

Improved Prompt Understanding

The model shows significant improvements in:

  • Following complex multi-part prompts
  • Understanding abstract concepts
  • Interpreting creative instructions
  • Handling edge cases

Use Cases for Reference Images

Character Consistency

Creating the same character across multiple images:

  1. Generate your initial character design
  2. Use that image as a reference for future generations
  3. Maintain visual consistency across scenes

Brand Style Matching

Ensuring AI outputs match your brand:

  • Upload examples of your existing brand imagery
  • Include style guide reference images
  • Generate new content that fits seamlessly

Art Style Transfer

Capturing specific artistic styles:

  • Use artwork samples as references
  • Combine multiple artist influences
  • Create new pieces in established styles

Product Line Extension

Creating variations of existing products:

  • Reference existing product photography
  • Generate new colorways or variants
  • Maintain visual consistency

Best Practices for Reference Images

Image Selection

  • Quality matters: Use high-resolution, clear reference images
  • Relevance: Choose images that clearly represent what you want
  • Variety: Different angles and contexts help the model understand
  • Consistency: Reference images should share the style you want

Combining with Prompts

Your text prompt should complement your reference images:

"A product photograph in the style of the reference images, showing a modern coffee mug on a minimalist desk, soft natural lighting from the left, shallow depth of field"

Number of References

  • 1-2 references: Good for simple style matching
  • 3-4 references: Better for complex styles
  • 5-8 references: Maximum control for character/brand consistency

Flux 2.0 Pro vs Other Models

vs Flux 1.1 Pro

Flux 2.0 Pro is the newer generation with:

  • Reference image support (exclusive)
  • Improved coherence
  • Better prompt understanding
  • Slightly higher cost (4 vs 2 credits)

vs Nano Banana Pro (Gemini)

Both support reference images, but:

  • Flux 2.0 Pro: 8 references, better photorealism
  • Nano Banana Pro: 14 references, better text rendering

Using Flux 2.0 Pro on Pixelift

To use Flux 2.0 Pro with reference images:

  1. Open the AI Image Generator
  2. Select "Flux 2.0 Pro" from the Quality category
  3. Upload your reference images (up to 8)
  4. Write a descriptive prompt
  5. Generate your image

Each generation costs 4 credits, reflecting its advanced capabilities.

When to Choose Flux 2.0 Pro

Select Flux 2.0 Pro when you need:

  • Consistent character or product imagery
  • Style matching to existing brand assets
  • Maximum creative control through references
  • The latest AI generation technology

For simpler needs without reference images, Flux 1.1 Pro remains an excellent and more economical choice.
